author: Kate Cox
title: Coronavirus misinformation is the latest test for social media platforms
description: If political interference wasn't bad enough, now there's COVID-19 disinfo, too.
content:
Enlarge/ It's just you and your devices now, in this socially-distanced world we all live in for the time being. Too bad the misinformation campaigns aren't also all on hold.
1 with 1 posters participating
The presidential race has fallen off the top of eve… [+4157 chars]
